identified-content.classifier: Top/Classifieds/Job Market/Job Categories/Music, Theater and Dance

abstract.p: Disk jockey, composer, producer and engineer Moby will perform at Hunka Bunka Ballroom in Sayreville, NJ (S)

block.p: One of music's most commercially successful mavericks, Moby -- a disk jockey, composer, producer and engineer -- uses his eclectic background to create provocative techno music. He integrates jazz, punk, soundtrack music and clever breakbeats into a highly stylized mix. His 1999 release ''Play,'' a blend of funky hip-hop and traditional folk and blues, was hailed by many critics as the year's best album. He recently released a greatest hits album, ''Mobysongs: 1993-1998.'' Don't expect him to be standing behind a turntable -- this guy is all over the stage, as he is all over the musical spectrum. Rare in the world of Backstreet Boys and ex-Mousketeers, Moby is an iconoclastic innovator. He will perform on Thursday at the Hunka Bunka Ballroom in Sayreville.

Rare in the world of Backstreet Boys and ex-Mousketeers, Moby is an iconoclastic innovator. He will perform on Thursday at the Hunka Bunka Ballroom in Sayreville.
